title: 1.4.5联机一段时间后出现MInecraft has run out of memory
author: ltachi
txt_content:
未命名.jpg (33 KB, 下载次数: 14)

下载附件

'
2012-12-9 02:53 上传





Minecraft has run out of memory
This could be saused by a bug in the game or by the 
jaca Virtual machine not being allocated enough 
memory. if you are playing in a web browser, try
downloading the game and playing it offline.

to prevent level corruption, the current game has quit.

we've tried to free up enough memory to let you go back to 
the main menu back to playing,but this may not have worked.
please restart the game if you see this message again.

replies.author: ltachi
replies.txt_content:
所有内存用完

这可能是saused被错误的游戏或由

哈卡虚拟机没有分配足够的

记忆。如果你是在玩一个网页浏览器，尝试

下载游戏玩离线。

防止腐败，目前已退出游戏。

我们试图释放足够的内存来让你回到

主菜单回来比赛，但这可能不会有工作。

请重新启动游戏，如果你看到这一消息。

replies.author: yuxuanchiadm
replies.txt_content: 请适当关闭一些程序（比如其他游戏），并且适当调高系统虚拟内存和JAVA最大使用内存值（在某些启动器里可以找到）

replies.author: huoyanzhiyan
replies.txt_content: 你让我看看你的服务器

replies.author: gary0108
replies.txt_content: 机翻的，虚拟机吃内存也蛮大的

replies.author: tony300300
replies.txt_content:
到控制面板，寻找java控制面板。然后点击java->view,到达用户板块。
调整起初内存以及最大内存（-Xmx1000M -Xms1000)
